ModMetaData.name: [Obsolete] Superhero Genes - Expensive Base
ModMetaData.author: alite
ModMetaData.description:
Simple mod that adds a -8 metabolic efficiency to the superhero gene base, the same amount received if you take all of the unsuper genes. It also adds a special archetype called Dormant Super which has the combined effect of all unsuper genes.
